named-query.name: SsMenu.findByUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT(o) FROM SsMenu o INNER JOIN SsPerfilXMenu s ON s.codMenu = o.codMenu WHERE (o.codMenuPadre = 0 OR o.codMenuPadre IS NULL) AND s.codPerfil = :codPerfil AND s.codMenu = o.codMenu ORDER BY o.orden ASC

named-query.name: SsMenu.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o ORDER BY o.codMenu ASC

named-query.name: SsMenu.findByCodMenu
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o WHERE o.codMenu = :codMenu

named-query.name: SsMenu.findByCodMenuPadreList
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o WHERE o.codMenuPadre = 0 OR o.codMenuPadre IS NULL ORDER BY o.orden ASC

named-query.name: SsMenu.findByCodMenuChildList
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o WHERE o.codMenuPadre = :codMenuPadre ORDER BY o.orden ASC

named-query.name: SsMenu.findByCodMenuPadre
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o INNER JOIN SsPerfilXMenu s ON s.codMenu = o.codMenuPadre WHERE o.codMenuPadre = :codMenuPadre AND s.codPerfil = :codPerfil AND s.subMenu = o.codMenu ORDER BY o.orden ASC

named-query.name: SsMenu.findMenuPadre
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM SsMenu o WHERE o.codMenuPadre = 0 OR o.codMenuPadre IS NULL ORDER BY o.orden ASC

named-query.name: Usuario.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Usuario o ORDER BY o.codUsuario ASC

named-query.name: Usuario.findUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Usuario o WHERE o.codUsuario = :codUsuario AND o.clave = :clave AND o.estado = 'A'

named-query.name: Perfil.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Perfil p ORDER BY p.codPerfil,p.nbrPerfil ASC

named-query.name: SsPerfilXMenu.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM SsPerfilXMenu p ORDER BY p.codPerfil ASC

named-query.name: Municipio.findByDepto
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Municipio m WHERE m.municipioPK.codDepartamento = :codDepartamento ORDER BY m.nbrMunicipio ASC

named-query.name: Alumno.findCarne
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Alumno a, AlumnocssPwd b WHERE a.carne = :carne AND a.carne = b.carnet AND b.password = :password

named-query.name: SsPerfilXAlumno.findCarne
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SsPerfilXAlumno a WHERE a.ssPerfilXAlumnoPK.carne = :carne

named-query.name: Perfil.findPerfil
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Perfil p WHERE p.codPerfil = :codPerfil

named-query.name: PerfilXUsuario.findByCodUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM PerfilXUsuario p WHERE p.codUsuario = :codUsuario

named-query.name: SsUsuarioSesion.findByCodUsuarioCarnet
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM SsUsuarioSesion u WHERE u.codUsuarioCarnet = :codUsuarioCarnet

named-query.name: Usuario.findByUsuario
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Usuario o WHERE o.codUsuario = :codUsuario

named-query.name: Usuario.findByTipInstitucion
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Usuario o, PerfilXUsuario p WHERE p.codPerfil = :codPerfil AND o.estado = :estado AND o.codUsuario = p.codUsuario
